name: Losing Heart
description:
WELCOME TO THE ENDLESS DUNGEON OF LOST SOULS. YOU ARE THE LAST HOPE FOR THESE TORMENTED CREATURES WHO WERE HUMANS ONCE. LOSE YOUR HUMANITY BY TEARING OUT YOUR HEART AND BEAT THE DEVIL OUT OF THESE CREATURES. REMEMBER TO REPLACE HOLLOWNESS WITH HUGS. THIS IS THE ONLY WAY TO HELP THE MONSTERS FIND THEIR LOST HUMANITY.

WASD to move,

Right click to throw/pick up heart

Left click to Punch/hug

Juhana - Game Design, Music Composing

Konsta - Pixel Art, Voice Acting, SFX

Markus - Programming

Patrick - Programming, Pixel Art, SFX

Made for Global Game Jam 2021
